summary: Tire of having a dark, lightless home? wanted to set up a nice glowing campfire? This little mod lets you add a light source wherever you please!
descriptionHtml:
Tired of that lightless alchemy room in breezehome, your dark dank basement in Proudspire.... No more! A warm lit welcoming home to come to. A nice campfire in the wilderness. 
This mod allows you to spawn a light source wherever you like.


TAKE YOUR PICK
There are four variations:
Light - Spawns a light source
LightBright - Spawns a brighter light source
LightFire - Spawns a fire that is a light source
LightLantern - Spawns a Lantern that is a light source

============
UPDATE:

Light Up Skyrim COLOUR
adds: white/green/blue light sources + white/green/blue light lantern
============


INSTRUCTIONS:
Place all the txt. files in your Skyrim ROOT folder (the folder with TESV.exe or C/Programfiles/Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim)

USE:
1)Simply open your command console ([~] key)
2)Type: bat light (or lightbright/lightfire/lightlantern, whichever you please)
3)Volia! a nice glowing light for you to bathe in
4) if you dislike your placement simply select the fire/lantern and type: disable

NOTE:
To have a nicely aligned fire/lantern (and not have half sunk into the floor) please align your 1st person view crosshair to the horizon or X axis before typing in \"bat lightfire\"

The actual light source is the glow from the blacksmiths forge. Simple isnt it?


COMPATABILITY:
This should not have any conflict with any mod, it simply a vanilla use of the bat function to spawn a light.


CREDIT:
Please take a little time to endorse this if you enjoyed it.
There is no need to credit me if you use this, I am simply utilizing the console commands to make a nice little utility.
author: Noobo
